Grasscutter
INDESTRUCTIBLE
EQUIP: ANY
UNEQUIP: DROP
EFFECT: Blades/Claws/Fangs. When this character uses it, you may instead use one of the dice in the attack rolls as your d6 result.
Light Object
Sword Equipment
10 Points

s017 Grasscutter [[COLOR="Red"]E[/COLOR]] EFFECT: Blades/Claws/Fangs. When this character uses it, you may instead use one of the dice in the attack [COLOR="red"]roll[/COLOR] as your d6 result.
October 4, 2022
Prometheus121
Ignoring whether or not you get 3 dice rolls or 2, even using your dice rolls I think is an excellent option. Most of the time, if you hit with an attack, you're probably going to have a 4+ on those dice. So for me this is a great pick to put on someone who has penetrating damage but needs a little more oomph from their sword.
September 15, 2022
hoojeebo
I played it as you either pick one of the dice in the attack roll, OR THEN you roll the d6 for BCF, but I'd be interested to hear if you could still roll the 3rd die and then choose.
